# Basic Livemol

```{.clojure .livemol}
[:root {}
 [[:download {:url "https://files.wwpdb.org/download/1cbs.cif"}
   [[:parse {:format "mmcif"}
     [[:structure {:type "model"}
       [[:component {:selector "all"}
         [[:representation {:type "cartoon"}
           [[:color {:color "red"} nil]]]]]]]]]]]]]
```


```{.clojure .livemol}
[:root {}
 [[:download {:url "https://files.wwpdb.org/download/1cbs.cif"}
   [[:parse {:format "mmcif"}
     [[:structure {:type "model"}
       [[:component {:selector "all"}
         [[:representation {:type "cartoon"}
           [[:color {:color "blue"} nil]]]]]]]]]]]]]
```
